page.title: 20Games Past And Present.
page.content: Nowadays children seem to spend most of their spare time watching television, playing computer games, listening to music or playing with any of the many fantastic toys which have been provided by modern technology. Playground games seem to be dying out. Some of the games which used to be played in school playgrounds were: hop -scotch, beware of the bear, tacky, high-tacky, shadow-tacky, all-over, one-after-all, hide-and-seek, skipping with ropes and playing marbles. Most of these games are chasing games. The boys never played games with the girls because that would be soppy and the girls wouldn't want to play with them anyway because they're always dirty and rough and they call girls names and tease them. Nowadays we just walk about at playtime or listen to a radio but we still dont play with the boys.
